known_issues: Cancel task and delete buttons are not responding to clicks

existing_features.title: Fix the Cancel Quest button (取消任务) in PersonalCenter to trigger the CancelQuestDialog when clicked. Ensure the button properly opens the dialog and handles the cancellation flow.
Fix the Delete button (删除) in PersonalCenter to trigger the DeleteQuestDialog when clicked. Ensure the button properly opens the dialog and handles the deletion flow.
Add visual feedback (loading states, disabled states, or click animations) to both Cancel and Delete buttons during processing to improve user experience and prevent double-clicks.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix cancel task and delete buttons to provide user feedback/response when clicked

projectName: Fix non-responsive Cancel and Delete buttons in Personal Center
